thread.title: Should the Government Regulate Artificial Intelligence?

author: Heidi Vogt
title: Should the Government Regulate Artificial Intelligence?
text:
Artificial intelligence brings tremendous opportunity for business and society. But it has also created fear that letting computers make decisions could cause serious problems that might need to be addressed sooner rather than later.
Broadly speaking, AI refers to computers mimicking intelligent behavior, crunching big data to make judgments on everything from how to avoid car accidents to where the next crime might happen. Yet algorithms arenâ€™t always clear on their decision-making logic. If a computer consistently denies... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
